page.title: 16Coton Village.
page.content: Coton is a very small village,known as a settlement,of about 6O people.It lies in a sheltered Northamptonshire valley. The most imposing house is Coton Manor, surrounded by beautiful gardens.A few cottages are made of mud and thatched but the rest are under lOO years old. There is no shop or public house and the only bus through the village is a SundayÂ£Saunterbus'.The residents vary greatly-a retired commander-a builder, an author,several bankers,a perfumer and a retired champion show jumper.The locals are friendly and helpful to each other but don't like any sort of change They are wary of new families who move into the village until they get to know them.It is bleak in winter but beauti- ful in Spring with many birds and wild flowers.The only real nusiance is when the airforce jets fly overhead at terrific speed,quite low and very noisy
